stimulusHtml: A charge +q is placed at the center of a tetrahedron whose faces are all equilateral triangles, as shown above. What is the flux of the electric field through one face of the tetrahedron?
choicesHtml: q ϵ 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@476D@

q 4 ϵ 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@482B@
The flux through one face cannot be determined from the information given.
